verses.verse: Then <WG5119> Jesus <WG2424> was led <WG321> up by the Spirit <WG4151> into the wilderness <WG2048> to be tempted <WG3985> by the devil. <WG1228>
And after He had fasted <WG3522> forty <WG5065> days <WG2250> and forty <WG5065> nights, <WG3571> He then <WG5306> became hungry. <WG3983>

And the tempter <WG3985> came <WG4334> and said <WG3004> to Him, "If <WG1487> You are the Son <WG5207> of God, <WG2316> command <WG3004> that these <WG3778> stones <WG3037> become <WG1096> bread. <WG740>"

But He answered <WG611> and said, <WG3004> "It is written, <WG1125> 'Man <WG444> shall not live <WG2198> on bread <WG740> alone, <WG3441> but on every <WG3956> word <WG4487> that proceeds <WG1607> out of the mouth <WG4750> of God. <WG2316>'"
Then <WG5119> the devil <WG1228> took <WG3880> Him into the holy <WG40> city; <WG4172> and he had Him stand <WG2476> on the pinnacle <WG4419> of the temple, <WG2413>

and said <WG3004> to Him, "If <WG1487> You are the Son <WG5207> of God <WG2316> throw <WG906> Yourself <WG4572> down; <WG2736> for it is written, <WG1125> 'He will give <WG1781> His angels <WG32> charge <WG1781> concerning <WG4012> You'; and 'On [their] hands <WG5495> they will bear <WG142> You up, Lest <WG3379> You strike <WG4350> Your foot <WG4228> against <WG4314> a stone. <WG3037>'"
Jesus <WG2424> said <WG5346> to him, "On the other <WG3825> hand, <WG3825> it is written, <WG1125> 'You shall not put <WG1598> the Lord <WG2962> your God <WG2316> to the test. <WG1598>'"

Again, <WG3825> the devil <WG1228> took <WG3880> Him to a very <WG3029> high <WG5308> mountain, <WG3735> and showed <WG1166> Him all <WG3956> the kingdoms <WG932> of the world, <WG2889> and their glory; <WG1391>
and he said <WG3004> to Him, "All <WG3956> these <WG3778> things <WG3778> will I give <WG1325> You, if <WG1437> You fall <WG4098> down <WG4098> and worship <WG4352> me."

Then <WG5119> Jesus <WG2424> said <WG3004> to him, "Begone, <WG5217> Satan! <WG4567> For it is written, <WG1125> 'You shall worship <WG4352> the Lord <WG2962> your God, <WG2316> and serve <WG3000> Him only. <WG3441>'"
Then <WG5119> the devil <WG1228> left <WG863> Him; and behold, <WG2400> angels <WG32> came <WG4334> and [began] to minister <WG1247> to Him.
Now <WG1161> when He heard <WG191> that John <WG2491> had been taken <WG3860> into custody, <WG3860> He withdrew <WG402> into Galilee; <WG1056>
and leaving <WG2641> Nazareth, <WG3478> He came <WG2064> and settled <WG2730> in Capernaum, <WG2746> which is by the sea, <WG3864> in the region <WG3725> of Zebulun <WG2194> and Naphtali. <WG3508>
[This was] to fulfill <WG4137> what <WG3588> was spoken <WG3004> through <WG1223> Isaiah <WG2268> the prophet, <WG4396> saying, <WG3004>

"The land <WG1093> of Zebulun <WG2194> and the land <WG1093> of Naphtali, <WG3508> By the way <WG3598> of the sea, <WG2281> beyond <WG4008> the Jordan, <WG2446> Galilee <WG1056> of the Gentiles <WG1484> â€“

"The people <WG2992> who were sitting <WG2521> in darkness <WG4653> saw <WG3708> a great <WG3173> light, <WG5457> And to those <WG3588> who were sitting <WG2521> in the land <WG5561> and shadow <WG4639> of death, <WG2288> Upon them a light <WG5457> dawned. <WG393>"
From that time <WG5119> Jesus <WG2424> began <WG757> to preach <WG2784> and say, <WG3004> "Repent, <WG3340> for the kingdom <WG932> of heaven <WG3772> is at hand. <WG1448>"

And walking <WG4043> by the Sea <WG2281> of Galilee, <WG1056> He saw <WG3708> two <WG1417> brothers, <WG80> Simon <WG4613> who was called <WG3004> Peter, <WG4074> and Andrew <WG406> his brother, <WG80> casting <WG906> a net <WG293> into the sea; <WG2281> for they were fishermen. <WG231>
And He said <WG3004> to them, "Follow <WG1205> <WG3694> Me, and I will make <WG4160> you fishers <WG231> of men. <WG444>"
And they immediately <WG2112> left <WG863> the nets, <WG1350> and followed <WG190> Him.

And going <WG4260> on from there <WG1564> He saw <WG3708> two <WG1417> other <WG243> brothers, <WG80> James <WG2385> the [son] of Zebedee, <WG2199> and John <WG2491> his brother, <WG80> in the boat <WG4143> with Zebedee <WG2199> their father, <WG3962> mending <WG2675> their nets; <WG1350> and He called <WG2564> them.
And they immediately <WG2112> left <WG863> the boat <WG4143> and their father, <WG3962> and followed <WG190> Him.

And [Jesus] was going <WG4013> about <WG4013> in all <WG3650> Galilee, <WG1056> teaching <WG1321> in their synagogues, <WG4864> and proclaiming <WG2784> the gospel <WG2098> of the kingdom, <WG932> and healing <WG2323> every <WG3956> kind <WG3956> of disease <WG3554> and every <WG3956> kind <WG3956> of sickness <WG3119> among <WG1722> the people. <WG2992>

And the news <WG189> about Him went <WG565> out into all <WG3650> Syria; <WG4947> and they brought <WG4374> to Him all <WG3956> who were ill, <WG2192> <WG2560> taken <WG4912> with various <WG4164> diseases <WG3554> and pains, <WG931> demoniacs, <WG1139> epileptics, <WG4583> paralytics; <WG3885> and He healed <WG2323> them.
And great <WG4183> multitudes <WG3793> followed <WG190> Him from Galilee <WG1056> and Decapolis <WG1179> and Jerusalem <WG2414> and Judea <WG2453> and [from] beyond <WG4008> the Jordan. <WG2446>
